703232f-a.text:
Bergen Street, south side, between Rochester and Buffalo Aves. A view of Hunterfly Road. An old road to Flatbush now in disuse. In the
background, is a view of St. Mary's Hospital.
1925.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.

706494f-b.text:
Rochester Avenue, north from Bergen Street, showing, on the east side of the avenue, the construction of Kingsborough Houses, a low-rent housing project of the New York City Housing Authority. Several hundred old-type frame and brick dwellings
were razed.
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS  October 24, 1940
Views 1,2
. iochester Ave. at dergen S. and northward. Neg. A-2wu
